CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper April 17, 1954, pg. 16, reads: "Leech Farm Patients Stage 'Hobby Show' - Patients at Leech Farm Hospital staged their annual 'Hobby Show' of articles made by the patients while convalescing...Among other patients who took part in the show were those in the bottom left photo. Left to right, seated: Daisy Holyfield, Mamie Jeffery, Audrey Hesekit, Evelyn Evans, Miss Theodora Coates, occupational therapists, Bessie McKinney and Leo Cox. Second row: Blanche Bell, Ann Knox, Viola Hunter, Ralph Titus, Frances Johnson, Jessie Sibely, Frances Cunningham, Virginia Alexander, John Rogan and Miss Andrews, registered nurse. Back row: Mr. Wright, Babe Hiasavsa, Helen Hidico, Shirley O'Brien, Raymond Holmes, Claudine Roberts and George Hogan... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Hospital patients and staff, first row from left: Daisy Holyfield, Mamie Jeffery, Audrey Hesekit, Evelyn Evans, Theodora Coates, Bessie McKinney, Leo Cox; second row: Blanche Bell, Ann Knox, Viola Hunter, Ralph Titus, Frances Johnson, Jessie Sibely, Frances Cunningham, Virginia Alexander, John Rogan, nurse Andrews, registered; back row: Mr. Wright, Babe Hiasavsa, Helen Hidico, Shirley O'Brien, Raymond Holmes, Claudine Roberts and George Hogan, posed during "Hobby Show" at Leech Farm
